title: Is it Time to Diversify or Focus in the Cigar Industry? - The After Show
itunes:title: Is it Time to Diversify or Focus in the Cigar Industry? - The After Show
description:
Things are starting to slow down in the cigar industry. What’s the right way to react to this? Should the industry be diversifying or focusing on what they currently do?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
